Salesforce Bookmark Manager

The Salesforce Bookmark Manager is a user-friendly web application designed to help Salesforce users efficiently save, organize, and access their bookmarks. With its intuitive interface, users can quickly add new bookmarks by entering a name and URL. The application features a dynamic list that displays all saved bookmarks, which can be easily filtered and searched through a built-in search functionality. Additionally, users can clear all stored bookmarks with a single click. This tool is perfect for managing important Salesforce links, enhancing productivity, and streamlining workflow.
